author: wmtan
body:
This PR fixes FileInPath to work properly in the presence of symbolic links in any relevant paths.
Currently, FileInPath does not resolve symbolic links before checking if paths match. This can cause matches to be missed. Since the IB unit tests are now run with a symbolic link to the src directory,
the FWCore/PythonParameterSet unit test was failing due to this issue.  This PR should fix the test.
title: FileInPath must handle symbolic links properly
